# loopia_subdomains (Data Source)

Fetches details about all subdomains.

## Example Usage
```terraform
data "loopia_subdomains" "example_com" {
  domain = "example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) The domain name to retrieve subdomains for

### Read-Only

- `subdomains` (List of String) List of subdomain names
